sentences.en: After the graft union has sealed , the upper portion of the understock is removed.
sentences.cn: 待接口愈合之后, 除去砧木的上部.

sentences.en: Hard graft is the only way to succeed in business.
sentences.cn: 艰苦奋斗是在事业上成功的唯一途径.

sentences.en: He had a skin graft on the burnt leg.
sentences.cn: 他烧伤的腿上做了皮肤移植.

sentences.en: His career has been one of hard graft.
sentences.cn: 他从事的职业劳动强度很大。

sentences.en: I am having a skin graft on my arm soon.
sentences.cn: 我马上就要接受手臂的皮肤移植手术。

sentences.en: In his graft way, he was very persuasive.
sentences.cn: 他虽然态度生硬, 但很有说服力.

sentences.en: Martha had to have several skin grafts .
sentences.cn: 玛莎不得不进行了多处皮肤移植。

sentences.en: McCluskey himself felt there was nothing wrong with clean graft.
sentences.cn: 麦克罗斯基觉得通过官方渠道捞些外快是无可厚非的.

sentences.en: Pear trees are grafted on quince rootstocks.
sentences.cn: 梨树被嫁接到榅桲的根茎上。

sentences.en: Roses graft well on brier roots.
sentences.cn: 玫瑰很适于接枝在石南根上.

sentences.en: Stock is the root, tree, or portion of a tree which the graft is set.
sentences.cn: 砧木是根, 或是树体, 或是在它上面嫁接树体的部分.

sentences.en: The boss of Minneapolis operated the most spectacular system of police graft in the country.
sentences.cn: 明尼阿波利斯的头头操纵着全国最引人注目的警察受贿网.
移植的皮肤引起了排拒反应.

sentences.en: The top layer of skin has to be grafted onto the burns.
sentences.cn: 表层皮肤必须移植到烧伤处。

sentences.en: Their success was the result of years of hard graft .
sentences.cn: 他们的成功是多年艰苦奋斗的结果。

sentences.en: There was that platoon leader Graft whom Dalleson had mentioned.
sentences.cn: 带队的那个克洛夫特,达尔生还称赞过他.

sentences.en: This was his first hint at graft, favoritism.
sentences.cn: 这是他包庇,偏私的最初的暗示.

words.tran_cn: [农学] 嫁接；接合；接受移植（graft的ing形式）
[外科][生物]移植；[农学]嫁接；赎职
[外科][生物]移植；[农学]嫁接；[法]贪污
[外科][生物]移植；[农学]嫁接；[法]贪污

phrases.tran_cn: 植皮手术，皮肤移植术；移植的皮肤

trans.tran_cn: 移植，嫁接，渎职，贪污，受贿
trans.tran_en: a piece of healthy skin or bone taken from someone’s body and put in or on another part of their body that has been damaged
to join a part of a plant or tree onto another plant or tree

trans.tran_cn: 移植，嫁接，接枝，贪污，用嫁接法种植
